attributes.action: bring about a system where for each MP there is a London council flat available for their use when at Westminster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the council flat is not to the liking of an MP, they can spend their own money on renting or buying a property themselves.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
